.. _changelog:

Changelog
=========

0.0.4 (dev)
-----------

Bug fixes:

 * only document related metadata
   (``elasticsearch_dsl.document.DOC_META_FIELDS``) can be stored by setting
   attribute on a document (#58).

0.0.3 (2015-01-23)
------------------

Added persistence layer (``Mapping`` and ``DocType``), various fixes and
improvements.

0.0.2 (2014-08-27)
------------------

Fix for python 2

0.0.1 (2014-08-27)
------------------

Initial release.
